attributes.action: Instruct the CAA that increasing air show fees will not make shows any safer
attributes.background: The CAA is proposing a 100% increase in basic fees for airshows and adding fees per display. As estimated, the fee for a 18-24 display airshow will increase to over £6000 adding considerably to the cost of an entrance ticket. This will discourage many from attending any airshows. Blatant opportunism
